text: The Albanian language () is an Indo-European language. It is spoken mostly in Albania (3,500,000), Kosovo and (500,000) Republic of North Macedonia. ==Dialects== Ghegs, Tosks, ArbÃ«resh, Arvanites, Arbanasi ==References== == Other websites == * An overview of the Albanian language and culture * Albanian language family tree * List of free online resources for learners Category:Indo-European languages Category:Languages of Albania Category:Kosovo Category:Languages of North Macedonia
